alert.note: Alert for South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued April 02 at 6:56PM PDT until April 05 at 6:00AM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE MONDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Southeastern Elko County and South Central Elko County. * WHEN...From Monday morning through late Monday night. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel could be difficult especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County
